name: Brett Games 128
overview: A 40/80 column compilation of games in both German and English. Including: Tele-Muhle (40 Column board game) Monopoly (40 Column board game) Delibera (40 Column strategy game) Mamkomania (40 Column board game anti-monopoly) Spiel Des Lebens (40 Column) Texas Oil (40 Column simulation) Solitaire (40 Column card game) 3D Muehle (40 Column) Backgammon (80 Column board game)
